reviews.review:
A total nostalgia trip. Not only that this game shaped the latest installment's competitive scene; but also is what got a lot of people in the FPS Shooter genre or even into gaming. I cannot recommend this game enough. It is a blast. From the games of old classics like de_dust2, de_inferno or cs_office , all the way to the custom content created by the community. This game has made its way into the hearts of many people.

Buy it when it costs less than a $
Muy bueno quiero mi experiencia en steam
Nostalgia, algo que nunca va a morir
